name: KoppsFlavorForecast
0:
”Alexa, ask Kopps Frozen Custard what the flavor of the day is”
”Alexa, ask Kopps Frozen Custard what the flavor forecast is tomorrow”
”Alexa, ask Kopps Frozen Custard what the flavors of the day are next Sunday”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kopps frozen custard
des: Ask Alexa what the flavor of the day is at Kopps Frozen Custard any day of the month! "Hey Alexa, ask Kopps Frozen Custard what the flavor of the day is," or "Alexa, ask Kopps Frozen Custard what the flavors are for tomorrow", or "next Monday," or "June 29th", or anything that falls in the current month.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
